definition: possessing muscular strength, make one's way by force
details:
noun
- possessing muscular strength
= synonyms: muscularity
- authority or power or force (especially when used in a coercive way)
= example: authority or power or force (especially when used in a coercive way)
- animal tissue consisting predominantly of contractile cells
= synonyms: muscular tissue
- one of the contractile organs of the body
= synonyms: musculus
- a bully employed as a thug or bodyguard
= example: a bully employed as a thug or bodyguard
= synonyms: muscleman
verb
- make one's way by force
= example: make one's way by force
